com.mesosphere.sdk.curator

Class CuratorPersister

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.curator.CuratorPersister
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persister

    public class CuratorPersister
extends java.lang.Object
implements Persister
    The CuratorPersistor implementation of the Persister interface provides for persistence and retrieval of data from Zookeeper.
